tune.name: Jim Stott's Jig
tune.author: Mikael Georgii
tune.content:
\relative f'' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key g \major
    \time 6/8

    \partial 8 fis8 |
    g8 g, fis' e4 dis8 |
    e8 d b d4 b8 |
    g8 a b d b dis |
    e8 d b c4 gis'8 |
    \break

    a8 a, g' fis4 e8 |
    fis8 e b c4 b8 |
    a8 b c e a, fis' |
    e8 d cis d e fis |
    \bar "||" \break

    g8 g, fis' e4 d8 |
    e8 d b d b a |
    g8 a b d g, dis' |
    e4. e4 b'8 |
    \break

    c8 e, b' a4 a8 |
    a8 a, g' fis4 e8 |
    d8 e d d e fis |
    g4. g4
    \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      a8 |
      b8 fis a g4 ais8 |
      b8 fis a g4 a8 |
      b8 fis a g b, e |
      d8 c b c4 gis'8 |
      \break

      a8 a, g' fis4 e8 |
      fis8 e b c4 b8 |
      a8 b c d e fis
    } \alternative { {
      \set Timing.measureLength = #(ly:make-moment 5/8)
      e8 d cis d4 |
    } {
      \set Timing.measureLength = #(ly:make-moment 6/8)
      g4. g4
    } } \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      g4. g/b | g2. | g | a:m7 |
      a2.:m7 | a:m7 | d:7 | bes4.:dim d:7/a |

      g2. | g | g | c4.:6 a:m |
      a2.:m/c | a:7/cis | d:7 | g4. s4

      s8 |
      g2. | s | g | gis4.:dim a:m |
      a2.:m | s | d:7 | bes4.:dim d4:7 | g4. g4
    }
  }
>>
